summary:
Simultaneously Meltdown Of Ores,
Make 1, 5 ,10,15 or 20 Ingots at the same time, If You got the Raw Materials ;)
descriptionHtml: Simultaneously Meltdown Of Ores :)Make 1, 5 ,10,15 or 20 Ingots at the same time, if you got the required raw materials the Melting recipe will appear, the melting recipe will not show on the menu before you got the materials needed to melt. It holds the crafting menu clean by not show the recipes that you do not have the materials to make. Except for the Basic Recipe,(1 ingot recipe) that one is always visible, so if you go to a smelter with enough ore to make 5 ingots, that recipe will be visible to use, when used the recipe disappear again to next time you have enough ores, It is Clean and handy :)
author: KennyBall

files.name: Simultaneously Meltdown
files.changelogHtml: Added Dwemer recipes to melt down More scrap at the same time.
